title: The Professor and His Obsession
description: ğ‘¶ğ’ğ’„ğ’† ğ’–ğ’‘ğ’ğ’ ğ’‚ ğ’•ğ’Šğ’ğ’† ğ’”ğ’‰ğ’† ğ’ƒğ’†ğ’„ğ’‚ğ’ğ’† ğ’ğ’Šğ’ğ’†. ğ‘´ğ’Šğ’ğ’† ğ’•ğ’ ğ’•ğ’†ğ’‚ğ’„ğ’‰. She comes to my class late. Innocent. Naive. Beautiful. A sheltered princess whose body begs me to teach her the forbidden things she only heard about. Her eyes mesmerize me. Her mind tempts me. Her pure heart speaks to the monster inside me.I crave to possess her.A beauty trapped in the gilded cage of her brother's creation.Her every move is watched. Scrutinized.His reputation alone promises trouble to whomever goes against his wishes. I should stay away from her. Instead she becomes my obsession. And I intend to keep her as my own no matter the cost. After allâ€¦Iâ€™m a sinner who will use every weapon in his arsenal to achieve what he wants. Even if it means declaring a war between our families to get her.
author: V.F. Mason
